params._ethLPRatio: ratio of ETH in the LP token, can be 2000 for an 80/20 bal lp
params._rndtPoolHelper: Pool helper address used for PRNT-WETH swaps
params._uniRouter: UniV2 router address used for all non PRNT-WETH swaps

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

quoteFromToken(address,uint256).details: this function is mainly used to calculate how much of the specified token is needed to match the provided PRNT amount when providing liquidity to an AMM

params._token: address of the token that would be received

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._slippage: maximum amount of slippage allowed for any occurring trades

params._assetAmt: amount of _asset tokens used to create dLP position
params._lockTypeIndex: lock length index. cannot be shortest option (index 0)
params._slippage: maximum amount of slippage allowed for any occurring trades

zapOnBehalf(bool,address,uint256,uint256.details: It will use default lock index

params._slippage: maximum amount of slippage allowed for any occurring trades

MAX_SLIPPAGE.details: If the slippage limit of the LockZap contract is lower then that of the Compounder, transactions might fail unexpectedly.      Therefore ensure that this slippage limit is equal to that of the Compounder contract.

MAX_SLIPPAGE().notice: The maximum amount of slippage that a user can set for the execution of Zaps

REFERRAL_CODE().notice: We don't utilize any specific referral code for borrows perfomed via zaps

ethLPRatio().notice: parameter to set the ratio of ETH in the LP token, can be 2000 for an 80/20 bal lp

getPoolHelper().notice: Returns pool helper address used for PRNT-WETH swaps

getUniRouter().notice: Returns uni router address used for all non PRNT-WETH swaps

poolHelper().notice: Pool helper contract used for PRNT-WETH swaps

quoteFromToken(address,uint256).notice: Calculate amount of specified tokens received for selling PRNT

setAaveOracle(address).notice: Set AAVE Oracle used to fetch asset prices in USD.

setPoolHelper(address).notice: Set Pool Helper contract used fror WETH-PRNT swaps

setUniRouter(address).notice: Set Univ2 style router contract address used for all non PRNT<>WETH swaps

uniRouter().notice: AMM router used for all non PRNT-WETH swaps on Arbitrum

withdrawLockedETH(address,uint256).notice: Allows owner to recover ETH locked in this contract.
